select cart_m_seq.nextval from dual
insert into cart_m (cbno, id, pbno) values (#{cbno}, #{id}, #{pbno})
mapper.select: select row_number() over(partition by c.pbno order by c.cbno desc) as num, c.pbno, c.cbno, c.id, c.quantity, c.putdate, a.price as aprice, t.price as tprice, a.name, a.image, a.abno, t.name as tname, t.pbno as tpbno from cart_m c inner join product_m p on c.pbno = p.pbno inner join album_m a on c.pbno = a.pbno inner join track_m t on a.abno = t.abno where c.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from cart_m where id=#{id} and cbno=#{cbno}
delete from cart_m where id=#{id} and pbno=#{pbno}
mapper.select: select c.cbno, c.id, c.pbno, c.quantity, c.result, c.putdate, a.abno, a.name as aname, a.singer, a.price as aprice, a.image, a.pbno as apbno, a.image_240, a.image_50, t.tbno, t.name as tname, t.price as tprice, t.pbno as tpbno, p.category, t.image as timage from cart_m c, album_m a, view_track_m t, product_m p where c.pbno = a.pbno(+) and c.pbno = t.pbno(+) and p.pbno = c.pbno and id=#{id}
